Claim: "A bird is flapping its wings on the water."
Implication: "The bird is flying over the trees."
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsFlapping(a) and IsOnWater(b))) & (forall d ( IsFlapping(d) ->  IsFlying(d))) & (forall e ( IsFlying(e) ->  IsFlapping(e)))) -> (exists c (exists a (IsFlying(a) and IsOver(c))))
